title: Violette's Vegan Organic Eatery and Juice Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, International, Organic, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Fusion
description: Vegan restaurant and juice bar, opened Jan 2015 in the Vons center. Offers healthy meals, breakfast, burgers, and more lifelong vegetarian chef. Free coffee with breakfast. Plenty of seating. Walls are decorated with colorful paintings. Brunch on the weekends until 2pm, and live music on Tue and Fri nights.
streetAddress: 8560 W Desert Inn Rd Ste D5
